content.question: Which of the following could best be used as evidence to support the argument in the excerpt?

choices.label: The industrialization of some segments of the southern economy
The efforts by some Progressive Era reformers to expand democracy
The requirement in many states at the time that citizens pay a tax before they could vote
The advocacy of organizations such as the National Association of Colored Womenâ€™s Clubs (NACWC)

content.answer: The requirement in many states at the time that citizens pay a tax before they could vote

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
